post.author: Admin
post.title: Next Band Booster Meeting - You Are Invited!
post.description:
Hello Band Families,
Please join us for our next Booster meeting this Monday at 7pm in the NRHS Med
post.content:
Hello Band Families,

Please join us for our next Booster meeting this Monday at 7 pm in the NRHS Media Center. We will get you updated on all the Spring Band events, including OMEA State Contest, the Band Awards Banquet, Band-A-Rama, and our Annual Basket Raffle Fundraiser. You can even reserve your spot at the 3-Spot for this fun-filled evening that benefits our Band Program! There will be plenty of food and drink, sideboards, 50/50 raffle, and fantastic baskets filled with goodies of all kinds. It's always a fun evening out and a great way to support our Bands. We are also in need of a few volunteers to help that evening, so please consider donating your time as well. Click on the Sign Up Genius here to help and as always, thank you!

Download: NRMB RAFFLE INVITE 2017
